website_summaries.verdict: Bring the sandbag workout anywhere by utilizing sand or water.
pros: Built for use as a dumbbell
Reviewers praise this sandbag's ability to travel
Packs easily and fills up quickly, resulting in an intense weight workout on the go
cons: Reviews suggest sand works better than water as a filler

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service experience
customer_reviews.text: Tore in less than a month, the handle is separating from the bag part. EDIT: I wanted to re-review this product because of the absolutely stellar customer service. I posted a review about my DryBell developing a rip and a representative got in touch with me directly and re-shipped a replacement. It turned out that it was a manufacturing defect and the new bag hasn't had an issue at all!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Least expensive way to convert dumbells and plates to kettlebell use, but handle is weak
customer_reviews.text: I like the whole idea of this bag, which you can put anything in. I think it a great solution for people like me who want to get into kettlebells inexpensively by using their old plates and even dumbells inside. The strong, 19" long waterproof bag and attached webbing loops could probably support twice the 10 kg it's rated for. I knock off two points for coming installed with delicate plastic attachments from there, that resemble what you'd find on cheap luggage. A ring and the handle snap broke on me very soon after I got it. The attachments to the webbing should be metal rings. There should be more substantial handles than the straps provided.
customer_reviews.author: J. S. Bullock

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to building a large collection of kettlebells.
customer_reviews.text: I have been interested in getting into kettlebells for some time now but did not want to drop a bunch of money on different weighted kettlebells. This solved that problem for me. Rather than using water or sand I put some of my 10 and 5 LB weight plates into the bag and it fit perfectly. The only complaint that I have is the handle is not super stiff like you would find on actual kettlebells, which seems obvious, but it is not quite as comfortable to hold as actual kettlebells. The pros of the adjust-ability of bag far outweigh the negatives. I would buy again in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: No excuse to not workout when traveling now
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this and some resistance band while traveling for work the last two months, working out about 4 times a week in my hotel room. I kid you not, I've lost 20 pounds and have never been in better shape. Also, you have to eat a sensible diet. But if you've got the commitment to buy something like this and workout when traveling, then you can eat healthy!
customer_reviews.author: BCW

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly durable!
customer_reviews.text: Although I this is built for sand/water, I've put some interesting things inside it, such as 30lb+ bricks, rocks and more! If you're worried about this being strong enough, don't be. I've exceeded the weight limit of this by far and it's just as strong to this day. Considering the price, there's no reason not to buy this. A definite recommendation!
customer_reviews.author: MasterOfThePcRace

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel workouts.
customer_reviews.text: I've lifted kettlebells for a long time. This bag intrigued me and I bought one. It's a bit light with water, but I found doing extra swing reps torched me. It's like chopping wood; it gets tough after a while. I travel a lot and this will be the ticket for portable workouts. I used plastic bags inside the main bag and there were no leaks.
customer_reviews.author: Open Mind

customer_reviews.title: Great for traveling, little awkward
customer_reviews.text: Great idea, I do really like it since I travel often. But for workouts other than simple curls (which it’s only about 25lbs) it’s awkward. Over head presses are decent, you get a lot of instability because of the water and that’s great for control but I’m struggling to find other exercises to use it for
customer_reviews.author: RyanK

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and portable
customer_reviews.text: Cheap and portable option. The same weight in kettlebell might cost 70 to 100 bucks. 50lbs of sand is only $5 at hardware stores. Easy to fill and empty. Padded handle is comfortable enough. Been durable so far. Has vinyl odor that goes away after a few days. You can use these for farmer's carry, stair climbing, kettlebell swings, and maybe throw inside a backpack for rucking.
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: These are fun!
customer_reviews.text: These are so much fun. I use them for farmers carries, kettlebells, Thrusters, situps, squats, lunges, and so much more. They are comfortable. They hold sand well. I am in the military and train rather hard most days, these have taken quite a beating from me, and they still look and perform well.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: get ready for a mess
customer_reviews.text: Trash. There isnt a way to completely close it so no matter what you're going to end up cleaning up water. Also the chart showing how much water weighs how many pounds is not at all accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Mariah

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag
customer_reviews.text: It's just a sandbag to beat up... Still, its built strong and the handle is designed well. It's comfortable to use and very affordable compared to similar options. Too bad its ugly yellow but that doesn't count against it.
customer_reviews.author: lereviewer

customer_reviews.title: It performs as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I was pleased to add this product to my travels as it provided about a 20+lb. weight that complimented my exercise regime. However, when used with water it LEAKS! There is no reason for this product to have faulty welds yet it requires a plastic bag insert or a towel to use.
customer_reviews.author: mm

customer_reviews.title: Worthless
customer_reviews.text: I got this to use while traveling. Unfortunately, it leaks terribly, to the point it is worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Blake Abercrombie

customer_reviews.title: great for travel
customer_reviews.text: great for travel , will double as water prof bag too
customer_reviews.author: jeff M.

customer_reviews.title: Used it once...
customer_reviews.text: Used it once, with a trashbag to hold the water, folded it up for travel, and once I tried to use it again, it leaked (pin hole on the side). I was out of the country and already had too much luggage weight so I threw it in the trash, otherwise I would have returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Great for what it is
customer_reviews.text: Great for what it is. The 'handle' isn't very comfortable to hold when it's heavy but that's totally forgivable for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Super strong multi-use dry bag
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because I don’t like stretch bands, Great idea for something to take on travels and it is much more robust than other dry bags I've had. Looking forward to giving it a go on the beach this weekend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Great for traveling. I can work out in my hotel room and avoid crowded hotel gyms.
customer_reviews.author: J. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Pretty happy with this purchase, this thing is great for people who want to invest in workout weights for home but don't want to have to lug something heavy around when you move or travel.
customer_reviews.author: Jinzei

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Love it, works great and is A LOT cheaper than the kettlebell alternative!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jay Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Glasp will not stay shut!!
customer_reviews.text: I loved it at first but less than a week the clasp does not hold.Very disappointed. Would love to know if someone would get ahold of me,Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Closson

customer_reviews.title: Great idea.
customer_reviews.text: This bag is a great product. I filled it with 20 lbs. sand for a fitness event. It worked as described. No leakage. I have not used the shoulder strap.
customer_reviews.author: Mike M.

customer_reviews.title: Worthless if you want to fill it with water
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure this works reasonably well if you fill it with sand but is worthless if you want to use water. The bag has no tight seal, so having filled it with water all you have is a bag of water that is open at the top. As soon as you pick it up the water spills everywhere. Worthless
customer_reviews.author: Bernard Clark

customer_reviews.title: It was maybe my bad but I thought this was a boxing item and ...
customer_reviews.text: It was maybe my bad but I thought this was a boxing item and its just a safe water proof case.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie Robert

customer_reviews.title: This is a great dry bag dumbbell
customer_reviews.text: This is a great dry bag dumbbell. All I have to do is fill it up. The handle works great. I was able to switch back and forth from hand to hand and do repetition exercises with it. Very handy and portable I can take with me to do exercises to go anywhere. Very impressed with this dumbell bag. Good for the Casual exerciser. Or for the Pro. Great for strength training. Nice durable material will last very long. I would recommend it to anyone looking for a good dumbbell for their exercise needs. I purchased this product at a discounted price in exchange for an honest review.
customer_reviews.author: Bellavia

customer_reviews.title: Satisfactory
customer_reviews.text: I liked the durability of this product, but I did not like the fact that the Velcro handle was made to narrow and wouldn't wrap around the connector straps of the sand bag.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent dry bag and a convenient size; I could even fit my laptop in there. Highly recommendable.
customer_reviews.author: Mr A Kleanthous

product_meta.title: Heavy Duty Dry Bag Dumbbell "DryBell" Waterproof Bag - Sand / Water Weight
product_meta.description:
Introducing Drybell: the world's first heavy duty drybag built specifically for use as a dumbell. 



NOW YOU CAN LIFT WEIGHTS WHEREVER YOU ARE! Wouldn't it be awesome if every hotel, campsite or hostel you stayed at while away from home had a weights room, if you're like us it never does: biceps curls with a tin of beans in one hand and a milk carton in the other just don't cut it - so we created DryBell! 

We've been using drybags to work out with while travelling for years, however there's a few issues: 

With normal drybags you can't tell how much water or sand is in each bag so if you're working with two bags or on different days, you usually have uneven weight. The DryBell's internal graduations tell you exactly how much weight you're lifting. 

Cheaply made dry bags aren't up to the job - they're simply not designed to lift weight; we've used the toughest materials available meaning these bad boys won't come apart. 

With other drybags, the catch can accidentally come undone (resulting in a wet floor and shoes!) and they are often uncomfortable on the hands. Drybells come with a removable SoftGrip handle which makes accidental unfastening almost impossible and they are not going to chew into your palm like regular drybags.

 Fill them with water or sand; sand gives you different weights (10L = 16.5kg with regular sand) so the internal graduations measure water. Sand works best - if you're using water, line the bag with a garbage bag.

 You don't want to work all year on your beach body just to have it waste away while you're enjoying the beach!! Order your DryBells today to stay in shape wherever you are!
feature_bullets: UNIQUELY DESIGNED DRY BAG FOR WEIGHT TRAINING while away from the gym
FILL WITH SAND OR WATER - sand gives optimum results - if using water we suggest lining DryBell with garbage liner to facilitate quicker drying and reduce risk of leakage on swinging
INTERNAL GRADUATIONS allow accurate weight measurement
SOFTGRIP REMOVABLE HANDLE gives a comfortable weight lifting experience and no accidental unfastening of clasp
PACKS DOWN SMALL for throwing in your backpack/suitcase or briefcase (weighs only 100g) but fill for any weight up to a 10kg/22pounds (water) or 16.5kg/36pounds (sand) weight
